LayoutXML:
<layout>
 <tabs>
  <tab>
   <text>
    <lang lid="en" text="Summary" />
   </text>
   <section>
    <rows>
     <row>
      <cols>
       <col req="3" fieldid="ACT_PRIORITY" colspan="3" valign="top" fieldtype="2">
        <text>
         <lang lid="en" text="Priority" />
        </text>
       </col>
      </cols>
     </row>
    </rows>
   </section>
   <section>
    <text>
     <lang lid="en" text="Key Information" />
    </text>
    <rows>
     <row>
      <cols>
       <col req="3" fieldid="ACT_STARTDATE" fieldtype="8">
        <text>
         <lang lid="en" text="Start Date" />
        </text>
       </col>
       <col req="3" fieldid="ACT_DUEDATE" fieldtype="8">
        <text>
         <lang lid="en" text="Due Date" />
        </text>
       </col>
      </cols>
     </row>
     <row>
      <cols>
       <col req="3" fieldid="ACT_ASSIGNEDTO" fieldtype="1">
        <text>
         <lang lid="en" text="Assigned To" />
        </text>
       </col>
       <col req="3" fieldid="ACT_ASSIGNEDBY" fieldtype="2">
        <text>
         <lang lid="en" text="Assigned By" />
        </text>
       </col>
      </cols>
     </row>
     <row>
      <cols>
       <col req="3" fieldid="ACT_CC" fieldtype="2">
        <text>
         <lang lid="en" text="Cc List" />
        </text>
       </col>
       <col req="3" fieldid="ACT_AGENDA" fieldtype="28">
        <text>
         <lang lid="en" text="Agenda" />
        </text>
       </col>
      </cols>
     </row>
     <row>
      <cols>
       <col req="3" fieldid="ACT_SUBJECT" colspan="3" fieldtype="2">
        <text>
         <lang lid="en" text="Subject" />
        </text>
       </col>
      </cols>
     </row>
     <row>
      <cols>
       <col req="3" fieldid="ACT_DETAILS" colspan="3" valign="top" fieldtype="9">
        <text>
         <lang lid="en" text="Description" />
        </text>
       </col>
      </cols>
     </row>
    </rows>
   </section>
   <section containscustominfo="true">
    <text>
     <lang lid="en" text="Classification Information" />
    </text>
    <rows>
     <row>
      <cols>
       <col req="3" fieldid="ACT_TYPE" fieldtype="2">
        <text>
         <lang lid="en" text="##Task## Type" />
        </text>
       </col>
       <col req="3" fieldid="ACT_STATUS" fieldtype="2">
        <text>
         <lang lid="en" text="Status" />
        </text>
       </col>
      </cols>
     </row>
     <row>
      <cols>
       <col req="3" fieldid="ACT_RELATEDTYPE" fieldtype="1">
        <text>
         <lang lid="en" text="Related Type" />
        </text>
       </col>
       <col req="3" fieldid="ACT_RELATEDTO" fieldtype="2">
        <text>
         <lang lid="en" text="Related To" />
        </text>
       </col>
      </cols>
     </row>
     <row>
      <cols>
       <col req="3" fieldid="ACT_CONTACT" fieldtype="2">
        <text>
         <lang lid="en" text="Contact" />
        </text>
       </col>
       <col req="3" fieldid="ACT_STATUSCODE" fieldtype="2">
        <text>
         <lang lid="en" text="Status Code" />
        </text>
       </col>
      </cols>
     </row>
     <row>
      <cols>
       <col req="3" fieldid="ACT_PARTNER_ACCOUNT" fieldtype="2">
        <text>
         <lang lid="en" text="Partner ##Account##" />
        </text>
       </col>
       <col req="3" fieldid="ACT_PARTNER_CONTACT" fieldtype="2">
        <text>
         <lang lid="en" text="Partner ##Contact##" />
        </text>
       </col>
      </cols>
     </row>
     <row>
      <cols>
       <col req="3" fieldid="ACT_ATTACHMENT" colspan="3" fieldtype="19">
        <text>
         <lang lid="en" text="Attachments" />
        </text>
       </col>
      </cols>
     </row>
     <row>
      <cols>
       <col req="3" fieldid="ACT_PLANNEDDATE" colspan="3" fieldtype="8">
        <text>
         <lang lid="en" text="PlannedDate" />
        </text>
       </col>
      </cols>
     </row>
    </rows>
   </section>
  </tab>
 </tabs>
</layout>
